meta.title: GROVYN | Software Engineering for Modern Enterprises
meta.description: Grovyn is a software engineering company specializing in web, mobile, and backend solutions.

hero.subtitle: Grovyn builds production-ready software systems for global businesses, focused on reliability, performance, and long-term maintainability — from architecture to deployment.

solutions_menu.industries_desc: Domain-specific engineering for Healthcare, Fintech, E-commerce and more.

infrastructure_menu.featured_desc: Seamlessly migrate your infrastructure to the cloud with our expert team. Zero downtime guaranteed.

menus.web_desc: Scaleable web applications with React, Angular, and Vue.
menus.mobile_desc: Native and cross-platform apps for iOS and Android.
menus.backend_desc: Microservices, API development, and scalable cloud infra.
menus.ai_desc: Cutting-edge AI agents and Generative AI solutions.

right.title: Long-Term Support & Lifecycle Management

metrics.title: Grovyn Next-Gen Engineering Initiative
metrics.subtitle: Production-ready systems engineered with precision, reliability, and long-term vision. We prioritize scalable architecture and high-performance delivery to empower your growth.

testimonials.title: Trusted by Teams Who Build for the Long Term
testimonials.subtitle: Enterprise teams rely on Grovyn to deliver secure, reliable systems that perform consistently at scale.

contact.subtitle: Engage directly with senior engineers to evaluate architecture, feasibility, and execution strategy for your next initiative.
contact.confidential_desc: Secure consultations under strict privacy protocols.
contact.nda_desc: Standard or custom agreements to protect your IP.
contact.no_sales_desc: Talk directly to the engineers building your product.
contact.brief_placeholder: Tell us a bit about the technical requirements or challenges...
contact.success_message: Our engineering team will review your requirements and reach out within 24 hours to schedule a deep-dive session.

footer.tagline: Engineering the next generation of digital products. From high-scale cloud platforms to seamless mobile experiences.

about.subtitle: Grovyn is a high-performance engineering collective dedicated to solving complex architectural challenges for global enterprises.
about.philosophy_desc: We don't just ship features; we engineer systems. Our approach prioritizes technical debt reduction, observable architecture, and user-centric flows.
about.cloud_native_desc: Built for AWS, Azure, and GCP reliability.
about.zero_latency_desc: Optimized response times for global users.
about.transparency_desc: Real-time project visibility via our engineering dashboard.
about.reliability_desc: Fault-tolerant systems designed to withstand peak global traffic.
about.user_flow_desc: Seamless UX engineering that bridges the gap between code and human intent.
about.cta_subtitle: Schedule a deep-dive session with our architects today and let's map out your project's trajectory.

careers.subtitle: Grovyn is a high-performance collective. We are looking for engineers who care about the "How" as much as the "What".
careers.culture_subtitle: We've engineered a culture that prioritizes deep work, high agency, and radical trust. No legacy baggage, just forward-thinking engineering.
careers.remote_desc: Measured by contributions, not clock-ins. Work from anywhere, supported by high-fidelity async tools.
careers.rhythm_desc: Focused engineering beats exhaustion. We protect your deep-work blocks.
careers.agency_desc: Small teams, massive architectural impact. We hire owners.
careers.trust_desc: Open roadmaps and open communication by default.
careers.openings_sub: Find your seat at the table
careers.no_fit: Don't see a fit? We're always open to exceptional talent.
careers.form_subtitle: Fill out the technical brief below. We're interested in your projects, your architecture preferences, and your vision for high-scale systems.
careers.technical_brief_placeholder: Briefly highlight your technical accomplishments or link to your strongest work...
careers.resume_hint: or click to browse local files
careers.success_message: Our engineering leads are reviewing your profile. You'll hear from us within 48 hours for a technical deep-dive.

items.title: Fast Delivery, Without Compromise
items.description: MVPs typically ship in weeks, not months. Speed comes from experience, clear decisions, and strong fundamentals.

items.title: Transparent, Fixed Pricing
items.description: Every project is scoped upfront with clear deliverables and timelines. No surprise costs or hidden dependencies.

items.title: Production-Ready by Default
items.description: Every build includes testing, code reviews, documentation, and deployment readiness.

items.title: Full Ownership, No Lock-In
items.description: You own the code from day one. Standard technologies, no proprietary frameworks or vendor dependencies.

items.title: Global Delivery, Thoughtful Execution
items.description: We work across regions and time zones with strong communication and dependable execution.

items.title: 90-Day Quality Guarantee
items.description: Post-launch support to fix issues, ensure stability, and fine-tune performance. We stand behind what we build.

ai_section.para1: Artificial intelligence at GROVYN is not a standalone offering. It is an integrated capability embedded into platforms where intelligence creates real operational value.
ai_section.para2: We design systems that incorporate automation, machine learning, and data-driven decision-making while remaining reliable, explainable, and maintainable over time.

free_quote_cta.subtitle: Share your project requirements and receive a detailed technical proposal with fixed pricing within 24 hours. No obligations, just clarity.
free_quote_cta.hint: Book a 20-minute discovery call • Receive proposal within 24 hours

privacy_page.intro: We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information when you use our website or services.
privacy_page.contact: For any privacy-related questions, please contact us through the contact form or email provided on this website.

terms_page.intro: By using our website and services, you agree to these terms and conditions. Please read them carefully. We reserve the right to update these terms at any time.
terms_page.contact: For questions about these terms, please contact us through the contact form or email provided on this website.

web.hero_subtitle_tagline: Built for scale. Designed for speed.
web.hero_subtitle: We design and engineer high-performance web systems where architecture, scalability, and measurable growth matter. From enterprise platforms to e-commerce and beyond.
web.expertise_subheading: Deep technical capability. Clear business outcomes.
web.expertise_intro: We don't do everything. We focus on systems where architecture, performance, and scale actually matter.
web.dedicated_desc: Our teams integrate into your workflow as an extension of your internal team. No handoffs, no black boxes—just clean execution and direct collaboration.
